greeting.text: Hello there! I'm Quinn, the plaza's fountain keeper. This fountain has been the heart of Grid-Town for years!

fountain-history.text: This fountain was built when Grid-Town was founded. They say if you make a wish here at midnight, it might come true! Not that I've ever seen any magic... but who knows?

plaza-secrets.text: The plaza is the social hub of Grid-Town! This is where people gather for events, announcements, and just to hang out. Keep an eye on the notice boards for community events!
